text: The bag was fine. The reason I am leaving a negative is because of the seller's irresponsible shipping & poor customer service. They incorrectly coded the purse as a 'man's overcoat' with a 30% duty as opposed to 9% which is what the duty is on a leather purse. I contacted the seller--no response, no help. After a lot of effort, I got it fixed through DHL. I would have paid $350 over for their mistake. See all the other people who said they paid 30% in the FB? The were overcharged. BEWARE!!!
label: neg

text: Description and photos were very deceptive. It was a MINI Tote not a standard-sized one. It was supposed to be free shipping and in fine print, possible import charges may be incurred.
